verses.text: How is the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* become \w dim|strong="H6004"\w*! \add how\add* is the \w most|strong="H2896"\w* fine \w gold|strong="H3800"\w* \w changed|strong="H8132"\w*! the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* are poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of every \w street|strong="H2351"\w*.

The \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w comparable|strong="H5537"\w* to fine \w gold|strong="H6337"\w*, how are they \w esteemed|strong="H2803"\w* as \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w pitchers|strong="H5035"\w*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w potter|strong="H3335"\w*!

Even the sea \w monsters|strong="H8577"\w* draw \w out|strong="H2502"\w* the \w breast|strong="H7699"\w*, they give \w suck|strong="H3243"\w* to their young \w ones|strong="H1482"\w*: the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add is become\add* \w cruel|strong="H0393"\w*, like the \w ostriches|strong="H3283"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.\f + \fr 4.3 \ft sea…: or, sea calves\f*

The \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of the sucking \w child|strong="H3243"\w* \w cleaveth|strong="H1692"\w* to the roof of his \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w* for \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*: the young \w children|strong="H5768"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \add and\add* no man \w breaketh|strong="H6566"\w* \add it\add* unto them.

They that did \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* \w delicately|strong="H4574"\w* are \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*: they that were brought \w up|strong="H0539"\w* in \w scarlet|strong="H8438"\w* \w embrace|strong="H2263"\w* \w dunghills|strong="H0830"\w*.

For the punishment of the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* is \w greater|strong="H1431"\w* than the \w punishment|strong="H2403"\w* of the sin of \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, that was \w overthrown|strong="H2015"\w* as in a \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*, and no \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w stayed|strong="H2342"\w* on her.\f + \fr 4.6 \ft punishment of the iniquity: or, iniquity\f*

Her \w Nazarites|strong="H5139"\w* were \w purer|strong="H2141"\w* than \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*, they were \w whiter|strong="H6705"\w* than \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*, they were more \w ruddy|strong="H0119"\w* in \w body|strong="H6106"\w* than \w rubies|strong="H6443"\w*, their \w polishing|strong="H1508"\w* \add was\add* of \w sapphire|strong="H5601"\w*:

Their \w visage|strong="H8389"\w* is \w blacker|strong="H2821"\w* than a \w coal|strong="H7815"\w*; they are not \w known|strong="H5234"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*: their \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w cleaveth|strong="H6821"\w* to their \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*; it is \w withered|strong="H3001"\w*, it is become like a \w stick|strong="H6086"\w*.\f + \fr 4.8 \ft blacker…: Heb. darker than blackness\f*

\add They that be\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* are \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than \add they that be\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* with \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w*: for \w these|strong="H1992"\w* pine \w away|strong="H2100"\w*, \w stricken|strong="H1856"\w* through for \add want of\add* the \w fruits|strong="H8570"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.\f + \fr 4.9 \ft pine…: Heb. flow out\f*

The \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w pitiful|strong="H7362"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* have \w sodden|strong="H1310"\w* their own \w children|strong="H3206"\w*: they were their \w meat|strong="H1262"\w* in the \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w accomplished|strong="H3615"\w* his \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*; he hath poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* his \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and hath \w kindled|strong="H3341"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and it hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* the \w foundations|strong="H3247"\w* thereof.

The \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, would not have \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* that the \w adversary|strong="H6862"\w* and the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* should have \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ For the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of her \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \add and\add* the \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* of her \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, that have \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of her,

They have \w wandered|strong="H5128"\w* \add as\add* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \add men\add* in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*, they have \w polluted|strong="H1351"\w* themselves with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, so that men \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* their \w garments|strong="H3830"\w*.\f + \fr 4.14 \ft so…: or, in that they could not but touch\f*

They \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto them, \w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* ye; \add it is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*; \w depart|strong="H5493"\w*, \w depart|strong="H5493"\w*, \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* not: when they fled \w away|strong="H5132"\w* and \w wandered|strong="H5128"\w*, they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, They shall no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \add there\add*.\f + \fr 4.15 \ft it…: or, ye polluted\f*

The \w anger|strong="H6440"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* them; he will no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w regard|strong="H5027"\w* them: they \w respected|strong="H5375"\w* not the \w persons|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, they \w favoured|strong="H2603"\w* not the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*.\f + \fr 4.16 \ft anger: or, face\f*

As for us, our \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* as yet \w failed|strong="H3615"\w* for our \w vain|strong="H1892"\w* \w help|strong="H5833"\w*: in our \w watching|strong="H6836"\w* we have \w watched|strong="H6822"\w* for a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \add that\add* could not \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \add us\add*.

They \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* our \w steps|strong="H6806"\w*, that we cannot \w go|strong="H3212"\w* in our \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*: our \w end|strong="H7093"\w* is \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, our \w days|strong="H3117"\w* are \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w*; for our \w end|strong="H7093"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

Our \w persecutors|strong="H7291"\w* are \w swifter|strong="H7031"\w* than the \w eagles|strong="H5404"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: they \w pursued|strong="H1814"\w* us upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, they laid \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* for us in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

The \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* of our \w nostrils|strong="H0639"\w*, the \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* in their \w pits|strong="H7825"\w*, of whom we \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Under his \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* we shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.

¶ \w Rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* and be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, that \w dwellest|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Uz|strong="H5780"\w*; the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* also shall \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through unto thee: thou shalt be \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w*, and shalt make thyself \w naked|strong="H6168"\w*.

¶ The punishment of thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* is \w accomplished|strong="H8552"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; he will no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* carry thee away into \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w*: he will \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*; he will \w discover|strong="H1540"\w* thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 4.22 \ft The…: or, Thine iniquity\f*\f + \fr 4.22 \ft discover…: or, carry thee captive for thy sins\f*
